title: Executive Order 5403-Power-Site Restoration No. 443, Pit River, California
content: So much of the order of November 19, 1912, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 316, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 37 N., R. 7 E., sec. 34, NW. ¼ of SE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5403-Power-Site Restoration No. 443, Pit River, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361102
